titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Summer and Special Programs Student Records
Yale Summer and Special Programs Student Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:41

did.unittitle: Yale Summer and Special Programs student records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of student records maintained by Yale Summer and Special Programs.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 15-C (YRG 15-C), Student records from Yale summer and special programs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Summer and Special Programs Student Records (RU 125). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of student records maintained by Yale Summer and Special Programs.
Sensitive content in this finding aid has been redacted to prevent disclosure. Unredacted finding aid restricted to office of origin only.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: No online inventory. Paper inventory available in repository.
